body_content.explanation: a situation in which something which was intended to have a particular result has the opposite or a very different result:
examples: The irony (of it) is that the new tax system will burden those it was intended to help.

body_content.explanation: the use of words that are the opposite of what you mean, as a way of being funny:
examples: Her voice heavy with irony, Simone said, "We're so pleased you were able to stay so long." (= Her voice made it obvious they were not pleased.)
